name: Alpine Ski VR
description: Alpine Ski VR by Suchworks Studios brings the thrill of skiing to your desktop. There are three different game types: Slalom, Freestyle and Heliski. Beat the splits on the 6 slalom levels, pull some tricks on the 6 freestyle levels, or cruise around the 100km2 offpiste; complete with your own helicopter!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: ntel i5-4590 Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD 290 Место на диске: 1 GB
